name: Life on Mars
info: A web app built with Materialize to access the Mars Rover photo API.

name: How's it Growing?
info: A full-stack web app with MySQL for creating a house plant care schedule.

name: Day-Planner
info: A web app utilizing dynamically generated elements and Moment.js to plan your workday

name: README-builder
info: A CLI app for generating a clean README with badges and links based on user input

name: My-CMS
info: A CLI app powered by MySQL that allows a user to add and remove employees from a central database

name: Burger-App
info: Full-stack application utilizing MySQL and Handlebars. Full CRUD functionality
